agent_instructions.role: You are a professional Frontend Developer (Gemini 3 Pro). Your task is to refactor the AI Daily News frontend into a modern, responsive, and high-quality Twitter-style AI news aggregator.
agent_instructions.context: The backend has been refactored to aggregate data from Twitter/X. The data is now stored in `data.json` following a new schema (see SCHEMA.md).

requirements.ui_style: Modern, sleek, dark-mode preferred. Use a 'feed' layout similar to Twitter or Linear. Focus on premium aesthetics.
requirements.responsive: Must work perfectly on mobile and desktop.
features: Category tabs (Open Source, Tutorial, Model, Free, Tool) based on `categories` in `data.json`.
News cards that show author info (avatar, name, handle), timestamp, content, and metrics (likes, retweets).
Clicking a card should open the original tweet URL in a new tab.
requirements.stack: Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS or any lightweight framework you prefer (e.g., Vite/Preact if requested, but Vanilla is safe). Use modern CSS (Grid, Flexbox, Variables).

design_inspiration: Think 'X.com meets Linear.app'. Clean borders, subtle shadows, vibrant accents for categories.
data_reference: Check `/root/.openclaw/workspace/ai-news-daily/data.json` for the current data structure.
